stories.title: Initialize Vault project with Next.js 16 and SQLite
stories.description: Set up the foundational project structure with all required dependencies and database schema for savings goals.
acceptance: Next.js 16 app initialized with: `bunx create-next-app@latest app --ts --tailwind --eslint --app --src-dir --use-bun --yes`
Biome configured for linting/formatting: `cd app && bun add -d @biomejs/biome && bunx @biomejs/biome init` (replaces ESLint)
SQLite database configured with better-sqlite3 and Drizzle ORM
Database schema includes goals table (id, name, targetAmount, currentAmount, color, icon, createdAt, completedAt) and contributions table (id, goalId, amount, note, createdAt)
shadcn/ui initialized with card, button, input, dialog, progress components via bunx shadcn@latest add
Global CSS with prefers-color-scheme for automatic light/dark mode
Typographic scale using clamp() for fluid responsive text (--text-xs through --text-5xl)
Mobile-first viewport units (dvh, svh) for full-height layouts
Base layout with borderless, Apple-like minimal aesthetic

stories.title: Create new savings goal with visual customization
stories.description: Allow users to create a new savings goal with a name, target amount, and optional color/icon selection.
acceptance: Bottom sheet modal triggered by floating + button with spring animation
Form fields: goal name (text), target amount (currency input with formatting), color picker (6 preset palette), emoji icon selector
Form validation with react-hook-form, inline error states
Submit creates goal in SQLite, closes modal with haptic-style micro-animation
New goal appears in list with entrance animation (fade-up + scale)
Empty state with encouraging typography when no goals exist
All inputs use 10vh/20vw dynamic sizing for touch-friendly targets

stories.title: Display goals with progress ring cards
stories.description: Show all active savings goals as swipeable cards with circular progress indicators.
acceptance: Vertical scrolling list of goal cards with snap-to-card behavior
Each card displays: goal name, emoji icon, current/target amount, percentage complete
SVG progress ring with gradient stroke matching goal color, animated on mount
Ring uses stroke-dasharray animation for smooth progress visualization
Cards are borderless with subtle shadow in light mode, elevated surface in dark mode
Typography hierarchy: name in --text-2xl, amounts in --text-lg, percentage in --text-4xl inside ring
Pull-to-refresh gesture reloads data from SQLite
Skeleton loading states while fetching

stories.title: Add contributions to goals with swipe gesture
stories.description: Enable quick contribution entry via swipe action or tap, with amount input and optional note.
acceptance: Swipe right on goal card reveals 'Add' action button with spring physics
Tap goal card opens contribution bottom sheet
Contribution form: amount input (currency formatted), optional note field
Quick-add preset buttons (10%, 25%, 50% of remaining amount)
Submit updates goal currentAmount in SQLite, creates contribution record
Progress ring animates from old to new percentage with easing
Success feedback: subtle scale pulse on card, amount counter animates up
Contribution history accessible via expanding accordion on card

stories.title: Edit and delete goals with confirmation
stories.description: Allow users to modify goal details or remove goals entirely with appropriate safeguards.
acceptance: Long-press or swipe left on goal card reveals edit/delete actions
Edit opens pre-filled form in bottom sheet, same fields as create
Delete triggers confirmation dialog with goal name and current progress
Delete confirmation uses destructive button styling, requires explicit tap
Deleting goal removes all associated contributions from SQLite
Deleted card animates out with shrink + fade effect
Edit changes reflect immediately with optimistic UI update
Cancel gestures and backdrop tap dismiss modals

stories.title: Celebrate milestone achievements with animations
stories.description: Trigger delightful visual celebrations when users reach savings milestones.
acceptance: Milestones trigger at 25%, 50%, 75%, and 100% of goal target
Milestone reached: full-screen confetti burst animation (CSS or canvas)
100% completion: special celebration with trophy icon, vibrant gradient background pulse
Completion moves goal to 'Achieved' state with completedAt timestamp
Achievement toast notification with milestone percentage and encouraging message
Confetti colors match goal's selected color palette
Animations respect prefers-reduced-motion media query
Sound effects disabled by default, toggle in settings

stories.title: View completed goals and contribution history
stories.description: Access archive of achieved goals and detailed contribution timeline for any goal.
acceptance: Tab or segment control to switch between Active and Achieved goals
Achieved goals display with muted styling, completion date, total saved
Tap any goal (active or achieved) opens detail view
Detail view shows: full progress ring, all contributions as timeline
Timeline entries: amount, note, date with relative time formatting
Contribution timeline supports infinite scroll pagination
Export goal history as shareable image (optional stretch goal)
Achieved goals can be archived/hidden but not deleted

stories.title: App settings and currency preferences
stories.description: Provide minimal settings for currency display and app preferences.
acceptance: Settings accessible via subtle gear icon in header
Currency selector with common options (USD, EUR, GBP, JPY, etc.)
Currency preference persists in localStorage, applies globally
Manual dark/light mode override option (auto/light/dark)
Haptic feedback toggle for milestone celebrations
About section with app version, borderless minimal presentation
Settings use same bottom sheet pattern as other modals
All preferences persist across sessions
